title: Inspired Leadership - where art and logic meet
description: Imagine if the key for leaders to create a transformational ripple effect across their business and life was as simple as doing a two-step calibration test? Joanne Flinn shares a powerful model to elicit inspired change in a way that Oprah, Malala and Facebook have. She share her own personal journey in applying this for more inspired life.
author: Joanne Flinn
